sheetTitle: Report a Missing or Found Cat
sheetDescription: Fill in the details below to add a pin to the map. Let's help them find their way home.
uploadCatPicture: Upload a picture of the cat
locationPlaceholder: Click on the map to select a location or enter address...
noCatsReportedDescription: Be the first to report a missing or found cat in your area!
